translations.Install demo content to quickly set up y: Install demo content to quickly set up your intranet with example pages, navigation, and images.
translations.The IntraVox GroupFolder will be created: The IntraVox GroupFolder will be created automatically when you install demo data.
translations.This will delete all existing demo conte: This will delete all existing demo content for
and replace it with fresh demo data.
translations.Any changes you made to the demo pages w: Any changes you made to the demo pages will be lost. This action cannot be undone.
translations.Configure which video platforms can be e: Configure which video platforms can be embedded in pages. Only HTTPS domains are allowed.
translations.IntraVox recommends PeerTube instances a: IntraVox recommends PeerTube instances and other privacy-respecting video platforms.
translations.Commercial platforms are allowed but wil: Commercial platforms are allowed but will show a warning due to tracking and privacy concerns.
translations.Discouraged - Significant tracking and p: Discouraged - Significant tracking and privacy concerns
translations.Paste a video URL from YouTube, Vimeo, P: Paste a video URL from YouTube, Vimeo, PeerTube or other supported platforms.
translations.Video will start automatically (muted fo: Video will start automatically (muted for browser compatibility)
translations.Video plays without sound (required for: Video plays without sound (required for autoplay in most browsers)
translations.The video owner or platform has disabled: The video owner or platform has disabled embedding. This is not an IntraVox issue.
translations.A network error occurred while loading t: A network error occurred while loading the video.
translations.The video file is corrupted or uses an u: The video file is corrupted or uses an unsupported format.
translations.The video format is not supported by you: The video format is not supported by your browser.
translations.An unknown error occurred while playing: An unknown error occurred while playing the video.
translations.IntraVox is not yet configured. To get s: IntraVox is not yet configured. To get started, you can install demo data or create your own pages.
translations.Get started quickly with example pages i: Get started quickly with example pages in multiple languages (Dutch, English, German, French).
translations.Customize video domains, upload limits,: Customize video domains, upload limits, and other settings for your organization.
translations.Start building your intranet with pages,: Start building your intranet with pages, navigation, and multimedia content.
translations.After installing demo data, refresh this: After installing demo data, refresh this page to see your new intranet.
translations.The upload limit is configured by your s: The upload limit is configured by your server administrator.

translations.Users can post comments on pages: Users can post comments on pages
translations.Users can add emoji reactions to comment: Users can add emoji reactions to comments
translations.New reaction replaces previous (like Fac: New reaction replaces previous (like Facebook). When off, users can add multiple different reactions.
translations.Page editors can override these settings: Page editors can override these settings for individual pages in the page editor.
translations.Configure which video platforms can be e: Configure which video platforms can be embedded in pages. Toggle services on or off.
Only secure HTTPS servers can be added. The URL will be validated before adding.
translations.{service} has tracking concerns. Conside: {service} has tracking concerns. Consider privacy-friendly alternatives.
translations.Only HTTPS URLs are allowed for security: Only HTTPS URLs are allowed for security reasons. Please use https://

translations.Please enter a valid domain name (e.g.,: Please enter a valid domain name (e.g., video.example.org)
translations.Invalid domain: TLD must be at least 2 c: Invalid domain: TLD must be at least 2 characters (e.g., .com, .org, .nl)
translations.Domain contains invalid characters. Only: Domain contains invalid characters. Only letters, numbers, dots and hyphens are allowed.

translations.MetaVox is not available. Install and en: MetaVox is not available. Install and enable MetaVox to use publication date filtering.
translations.Select the MetaVox date fields used for: Select the MetaVox date fields used for publication filtering. The News widget will use these fields to filter pages based on their publication period.
translations.No date fields found in MetaVox. Create: No date fields found in MetaVox. Create date fields in MetaVox first and assign them to the IntraVox groupfolder.
translations.Pages will only be shown on or after thi: Pages will only be shown on or after this date.
Pages will be hidden after this date.
translations.Filter pages based on publication and ex: Filter pages based on publication and expiration dates configured in admin settings.
